    • LoadPickupLocations

      public static boolean LoadPickupLocations(String strTable, String strPrimaryKeyColumn, String strLocationNameColumn, String strAddressColumn, String strCityColumn, String strStateColumn, String strZipColumn)
      Loads the list of car rental pickup locations from the database.
      Parameters:
      strTable - Table name (TLocations)
      strPrimaryKeyColumn - Primary key column name (intLocationID)
      strLocationNameColumn - Location name column name (strLocationName)
      strAddressColumn - Address column name (strAddress)
      strCityColumn - City column name (strcity)
      strStateColumn - State column name (strState)
      strZipColumn - ZIP column name (strZip)
      Returns:
      True if data is successfully loaded, false otherwise
